title: Google is muting some sounds when connected to Bluetooth headphones
content:
Many people are going thru this problem and I have followed everything told on this reddit post.

https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/buqmtg/notificationringermedia_volume_bug/

One of your support person had told user : @thepieman458 
to clear cache and data of pixel launcher, sounds, Google play services. 
But that hasn't solved anything. Please have a look into this.
